title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (17/12/2008 12:00): XWiki.geertjan was modified by XWiki.geertjan (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/geertjan  
xwikibot - (17/12/2008 16:45): Design.DefaultWikiImprovements was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/DefaultWikiImprovements  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:09): is there more documentation available about document API  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:09): the javadoc is sometimes very short  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:09): for example:  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:10): there a ~5 display methods possible, but differences are not explained  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:10): neither some arguments  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:10): public java.lang.String display(java.lang.String fieldname, java.lang.String mode,  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:10): what is mode ?  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:11): (if possible I want to edit a string property but using an option tag)  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:11): jvdrean: ? ;p  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 17:12): I think mode should be called action  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 17:12): -> "view", "edit", etc  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:12): hmm ok  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 17:13): view will display a plain string, edit will display an input (in the case of a string)  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:13): ok  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:14): so I'm not sure that want is possible   
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 17:16): you can have full control on the display via the "custom displayer" filed  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 17:16): s/filed/field/  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 17:17): hum, I should write a tuto/snippet about this  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:21): custom displayer? using document's api?  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 17:23): it's a field in property definitions  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:31): ah !  
asyd - (17/12/2008 17:31): and what is expexted? html code?  
xwikibot - (17/12/2008 17:52): XWiki.bsprott was modified by XWiki.bsprott (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/bsprott  
xwikibot - (17/12/2008 17:58): AdminGuide.InstallationMSSQL was modified by xwiki:XWiki.hel (Added comment) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationMSSQL  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 18:11): asyd: sorry, was otp  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 18:11): you need to put velocity in it  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 18:11): I'll write a snippet tomorrow during lunch break  
jvdrean - (17/12/2008 18:13): (asyd: ping me if I forget)  
xwikibot - (17/12/2008 18:59): XWiki.IvanPodgorny was modified by XWiki.IvanPodgorny (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/IvanPodgorny
